All policy terms and conditions are stor: Edebere usoro na ọnọdụ mkpo niile na blockchain, na-eme ka ihe niile doo anya ma ghara ịgbanwe agbanwe.
Blockchain-Powered Insurance for Everyth: Mkpo nke Blockchain Kwadoro maka Ihe Niile
Blockchain-based insurance uses smart co: Mkpo dabere na blockchain na-eji nkwekọrịta smart iji mee ka njikwa mkpo na nhazi nkwupụta dị mfe. Ị na-akwụ ụgwọ mkpo na cryptocurrency ma ọ bụ ego ọdịnala, a na-edekwa usoro mkpo na blockchain. Mgbe ihe omume kpuchiri ekpuchi mere (nke data sitere na ngwaọrụ IoT, data ihu igwe, ma ọ bụ akụkọ gọọmentị kwadoro), nkwekọrịta smart na-ahazi nkwupụta gị na-akpaghị aka ma na-enye ịkwụ ụgwọ na-enweghị nnyonye anya.
Blockchain-based life policies with auto: Mkpo ndụ dabere na blockchain na-arụ ọrụ na-akpaghị aka na uru ọnwụ cryptocurrency.

Choose the coverage that fits your needs: Họrọ mkpuchi dabara na mkpa gị na nhọrọ ịkwụ ụgwọ dị mfe.
Coverage for event cancellations or disr: Mkpuchi maka ịkagbu ihe omume ma ọ bụ ndọpụ uche na nkwụghachi akpaaka.
Coverage for funds invested in decentral: Mkpuchi maka ego etinyere na usoro ego decentralized megide mbanye anataghị ikike ma ọ bụ nrigbu.
Crop and livestock insurance with automa: Mkpo ihe ọkụkụ na anụ ụlọ na nkwupụta akpaaka dabere na data ihu igwe.
Decentralized medical records and usage-: Ederede ahụike decentralized na ụgwọ mkpo dabere na ojiji na nchekwa ahụike DeFi.

Esports tournament coverage and in-game: Mkpuchi asọmpi Esports na mkpo akụ dị n'ime egwuregwu.
Explore our innovative blockchain-powere: Nyochaa ụdị mkpo ọhụrụ anyị nke blockchain kwadoro
Find answers to common questions about o: Chọta azịza nye ajụjụ ndị a na-ajụkarị gbasara ọrụ mkpo anyị dabere na blockchain.
Flight delay compensation and lost lugga: Nkwụghachi oge ụgbọ elu na mkpuchi akpa furu efu na nhazi nkwupụta akpaaka.
From crypto to cars, health to homes - p: Site na crypto ruo ụgbọ ala, ahụike ruo ụlọ - chebe ihe dị mkpa na ngwọta mkpo blockchain ọhụrụ anyị.

Many claims are processed automatically: A na-ahazi ọtụtụ nkwupụta na-akpaghị aka site na sistemụ nkwekọrịta smart anyị mgbe data enwetara kwadoro ihe omume kpuchiri ekpuchi. Maka nkwupụta ndị chọrọ nkwenye ọzọ, banye na dashboard akaụntụ gị, gaa na ngalaba nkwupụta, wee soro usoro nduzi. Ị ga-achọ ịnye nkọwa gbasara ihe ahụ merenụ na akwụkwọ ọ bụla achọrọ. Ndị otu anyị na-enyocha nkwupụta akwụkwọ ntuziaka ozugbo, na-abụkarị n'ime awa 24-48.
Name: Aha
Our blockchain-powered insurance process: Usoro mkpo anyị nke blockchain kwadoro dị mfe, doo anya, ma dị irè
Our insurance solutions leverage blockch: Ngwọta mkpo anyị na-eji teknụzụ blockchain maka nghọta, ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma, na nchekwa.
Pay premiums and receive claims in crypt: Kwụọ ụgwọ mkpo ma nata nkwupụta na cryptocurrency ma ọ bụ stablecoins na ụgwọ dị ala na nhazi ngwa ngwa.
Premiums are calculated based on several: A na-agbakọ ụgwọ mkpo dabere na ọtụtụ ihe gụnyere uru akụ ndị a na-ekpuchi, ihe ize ndụ a na-ekpuchi, data akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ntule ihe ize ndụ ozugbo. Maka ụfọdụ ụdị mkpo dị ka ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ mkpo ahụike, anyị nwere ike iji data sitere na ngwaọrụ ejikọrọ iji nye ọnụahịa dabere na ojiji nke na-akwụghachi omume nchekwa na ụgwọ mkpo dị ala. Anyị na-enye ọnụahịa ahaziri iche mgbe ntule ihe ize ndụ dị mkpirikpi gasịrị.
Protect your Non-Fungible Tokens against: Chebe Token ndị na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe gị megide izu ohi, mmebi, ma ọ bụ mgbanwe ahịa.
Protect your digital investments against: Chebe itinye ego dijitalụ gị megide mbanye anataghị ikike, izu ohi, na ọdịda nkwekọrịta smart.
Select from our range of insurance categ: Họrọ n'ụdị mkpo anyị dị iche iche wee hazie mkpuchi gị ka ọ dabara na mkpa gị.
Smart contracts automatically process an: Nkwekọrịta smart na-ahazi ma na-akwụ ụgwọ nkwupụta na-akpaghị aka mgbe emezuru ọnọdụ enwetara, na-ewepụ igbu oge.
Smart contracts for employee benefits an: Nkwekọrịta smart maka uru ndị ọrụ na mkpo usoro nnyefe na nkwupụta akpaaka.
Smart home integration with IoT sensors: Mmekọrịta ụlọ smart na ihe mmetụta IoT maka nchọpụta mmebi akpaaka na nkwupụta.
Smart telematics-based claims and pay-pe: Nkwupụta dabere na telematics smart na nhọrọ ịkwụ ụgwọ kwa mile na ịkwụ ụgwọ akpaaka.
We offer comprehensive coverage across m: Anyị na-enye mkpuchi zuru oke n'ọtụtụ ụdị gụnyere akụ crypto, ụgbọ ala, ụlọ, ahụike, njem, akụ azụmahịa, ihe onwunwe ọgụgụ isi, NFT, anụ ụlọ, na ndị ọzọ. Ụdị mkpo ọ bụla nwere nhọrọ mkpuchi akọwapụtara nke dabara na ihe ize ndụ pụrụ iche nke klaasị akụ ahụ. Kpọtụrụ anyị maka ndepụta zuru ezu nke akụ ndị ekpuchiri na mpaghara mmasị gị.
When a covered event occurs, verified by: Mgbe ihe omume kpuchiri ekpuchi mere, nke data ụwa n'ezie kwadoro, a na-ahazi ma na-akwụ ụgwọ nkwupụta gị na-akpaghị aka.
Yes, we accept premium payments in major: Ee, anyị na-anabata ịkwụ ụgwọ mkpo na cryptocurrencies ndị isi gụnyere Bitcoin, Ethereum, na stablecoins dị ka USDC na DAI. Anyị na-enyekwa ụzọ ịkwụ ụgwọ ọdịnala maka ndị na-ahọrọ ha. Ịkwụ ụgwọ Cryptocurrency na-ebutekarị ụgwọ dị ala na oge nhazi ngwa ngwa maka ụgwọ mkpo na nkwupụta.
Your policy is created as a smart contra: A na-emepụta mkpo gị dị ka nkwekọrịta smart na blockchain, na-eme ka nghọta na enweghị ike ịgbanwe agbanwe.
